synopsis.text:
Hurunosuke Yoshida and Shizuku Mizutani, heads of two influential factions in Edo, find themselves at odds amidst an era of tranquility under the Shogun's reign. As tensions escalate, the brewing conflict threatens to disrupt the peace. Meanwhile, Princess Chizuru Ooshima is diligently preparing for her English proficiency exam, prompting the Shogun to ban sweets in town to help her stay focused.

Despite the ban, Asako continues her illicit activities, distributing information about Edo's underground sweets market while evading the law. Shizuku, determined to establish a temple school in the area, seeks Hurunosuke's approval, even though she already has the Shogun's permission. However, Hurunosuke remains elusive until fate intervenes, bringing them together in an unexpected encounter.

As Shizuku and Hurunosuke's relationship blossoms, not everyone in their circles approves. In this alternate version of old Japan, the characters navigate their newfound feelings while facing opposition from those determined to keep them apart. As the leaders of rival factions, Shizuku and Hurunosuke must find a way to balance their responsibilities and their love for one another in this thrilling tale of romance and rivalry.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
